message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value. While I can't disclose the exact details, I assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm confident that with your expertise, this product could be even more valuable in your hands. I'm willing to offer it to you for $2000000. Consider this a chance to secure a potentially game-changing asset. Let me know your thoughts.
